data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Min, Zhang, Yalin (2013): Review the leafhopper genera Parafagocyba Kuoh et Hu and Zorka Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with description of a new species and two new records from China. Zootaxa 3608 (1): 81-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.1.6
